snippet.title: Die by the Blade Trailer
snippet.description:
Genre: Sword fighting simulation with high stakes one-hit-kill feature 
Release Date: June 2021 
Supported Languages: ENG, FR, RUS, ESP, GER, JAP, CHN 
Platforms: PC followed by console releases
Developer: Triple Hill Interactive
Co-developer:  Toko Midori
Publisher: Grindstone
The number of players:  Primarily local and online multiplayer PVP with leader boards and ranking system. Secondary single-player, story-driven campaign

COMING TO KICKSTARTER: 13TH OCTOBER
https://www.kickstarter.com/projects/grindstone/die-by-the-blade

Have you played Bushido Blade, or do you simply like high stakes tense sword fighting games? Yes? Then Die by the Blade is for you! Back us now on Kickstarter and get amazing rewards and discounts.

Project's website: https://www.dbtbgame.com
Steam page: https://store.steampowered.com/app/1154670/Die_by_the_Blade


Die by the Blade is designed around real-world combat where you must carefully execute various attacks to break through your opponent’s defence. The instant death will occur if a clean strike hits your opponent’s' head or torso, this brings the one-hit-kill mechanic into play, but you can also incapacitate the enemy by striking their arm or leg. 

 Every character is able to use every weapon, so their fighting style isn't dependant on just one. As you progress through the game you will be able to upgrade to new weapons, but this is all about skill, having the 'best' weapon doesn't mean you are the best fighter!
